title: Implement heap-to-stack conversion
body:
Implement heap-to-stack (and heap-to-register) conversion: when a heap-allocated value does not escape its scope, allocate it on the stack instead.

**Deliverables:**
- Escape analysis: determine which `store`d values are only used within the current function (never passed to other functions or stored in other heap nodes)
- For non-escaping values: replace `store` + `fetch` with local variables (stack allocation)
- For values used only once: inline the value directly (register allocation)
- Unit tests showing heap allocations eliminated

**Design notes:**
- This reduces GC pressure significantly
- GRIN's explicit `store`/`fetch` makes escape analysis straightforward
- Combined with unboxing, this can eliminate most heap allocation for simple programs
